menu.item-veg-description: Mushroom and green peas cooked in warm and comforting spices in onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Minced chicken cooked in flavorful freshly ground spices cooked in an onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 paratha + green chutney + pickled onions

menu.item-veg-description: Cripsy potatoes cooked in spicy tangy cashew & yogurt based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Boiled eggs added to a rich and flavourful creamy gravy made with cashew nut paste, yogurt and coconut milk topped with fried onions served with 2 parathas + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Flavourful street style chickpeas cooked in freshly ground Indian spices topped with tangy potatoes served with 2 parathas/batura (fried indian bread) + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A flavourful parsi dish, with prawns cooked in flavourful tangy, sweet and spicy red gravy served with rice + 1 paratha + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Street style mixed veggies cooked in warm flavourful freshly ground spices served with 2 butter toasted buns + chopped onions and coriander mix
menu.item-nonveg-description: Boiled eggs wrapped in spicy minced chicken mixture, fried and added to a flavourful aromatic tomato, yogurt and cashew nut based thick gravy served with 2 parathas + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-name: Veg Triple Schezwan Fried Rice with Manchurian
menu.item-veg-description: A favourite among Indians! Spicy, flavourful Indo-Chinese dish cooked with mix of veggies in spicy schezwan sauce served with a flavourful sauce containing vegetable balls
menu.item-nonveg-name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Fried Rice with Manchurian
menu.item-nonveg-description: Favourite among Indians! Spicy, flavourful Indo-chinese dish cooked with mix of veggies and chicken in spicy schezwan sauce served with a flavourful sause containing chicken meatballs

menu.item-veg-description: A flavour packed spicy mix of cottage cheese sandwiched between slices of Indian cottage cheese, fried and added to a creamy onion & cashew based gravy served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Marinated lamb pieces slow cooked in aromatic warm spices in a spicy flavourful onion & cashew nut based gravy served with rice + 1 paratha + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: A dish from the city of Kolhapur (Maharashtra). A mix of vegetables cooked in thick, spiced gravy served with 2 parathas + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A dish from the State of Karnataka. A combination of succulent pieces of chicken marinated and cooked in a robust spice mix and cooked in ghee served with 2 parathas + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: A twist in the traditional Gujrati kadhi with a dash of beetroot puree topped with some crispy fried okra perfect as a comfort meal served with rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A dish from the region of Goa. Classic pickled prawns with a balance of hot, tangy, sweet and spicy notes served with 2 buns + side salad + papad
